body:
It is possible that the output as binary options are not necessary as mentioned in this comment. Initial testing in the course of the PR showed list tests failing when using just physical type, so more investigation is needed.

_Originally posted by @vuule in https://github.com/rapidsai/cudf/pull/11328#discussion_r932696159_

title: Investigate need for output as binary configuration option
